meanings.definition: The position or rank of a captain.
meanings.sent1: In the navy, the captaincies are highly respected roles.
meanings.sent2: The captaincies on the ship ensure smooth sailing.
meanings.sent3: The captaincies of the team led to victory in the championship.
meanings.sent4: Her leadership style embodied the essence of captaincies.
meanings.sent5: The captaincies stood proudly at the helm of the vessel.

meanings.definition: The authority or jurisdiction of a captain.
meanings.sent1: The captaincies allowed him to make important decisions.
meanings.sent2: With the captaincies, he had control over the crew.
meanings.sent3: The captaincies were challenged by a mutinous crew.
meanings.sent4: His captaincies extended far beyond the ship.
meanings.sent5: The captaincies enforced discipline with a firm hand.

meanings.definition: The term of office of a captain.
meanings.sent1: His captaincies lasted for many years.
meanings.sent2: The captaincies changed hands every few months.
meanings.sent3: The captaincies were filled with both challenges and rewards.
meanings.sent4: The captaincies symbolized stability and continuity.
meanings.sent5: The captaincies brought order to the chaotic seas.
